description: Blink (Clarice Ferguson) is a fictional character, a superheroine who appears in American comic books published by Marvel Comics, as well as in a number of movie, television, and video game adaptations; typically in fiction related to the X-Men. The character was created by Scott Lobdell and Joe Madureira, and first appeared in the comic book Uncanny X-Men #317, published in 1994.Blink is a member of a fictional sub-species of humanity known as "mutants", who are born with superhuman abilities.  Blink has the power of teleportation.
name: Blink
